Articles.Content:
Hello. I stranded Valentina and Bob in an elliptical orbit around Kerbin (not enough fuel to get home), and so sent Jeb and Bill to refuel. At around 200m approach, Val and Bob just disappear. Looking at the log file, I get this message:

Quote

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "GooExperiment/model/Squad/Parts/Science/GooExperiment/GooExperiment(Clone)/GooExperiment/Capsule001"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "GooExperiment/model/Squad/Parts/Science/GooExperiment/GooExperiment(Clone)/GooExperiment/Capsule001"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door01/Cylinder_003"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door01/Cylinder_004"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door2/Cylinder_009"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door2/Cylinder_010"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door3/Cylinder_011"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door3/Cylinder_012"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door4/Cylinder_005"

[ERR 22:39:18.357] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "ServiceBay.187/model/Squad/Parts/Utility/ServiceBay/ServiceBay_125(Clone)/untitled/Service01/cargo/TrussMount/Door4/Cylinder_006"

I've got a 1.87m Service Bay stuffed with science experiments on Val and Bob's ship. I'm wondering what all this means. Also, the whole Kerbal system disappears after Val and Bob - although I can go back to the space centre (which is in perpetual night since the sun is gone). Val and Bob are listed as being on active duty, not MIA.

Picture (notice Val and Bob are upside-down, ship is gone):

added picture
